name: 翁頌舜
objective: 使學生了解目前DBMS的發展趨勢以及與資料庫系統相關的各種應用實例與環境，探討Distributed DBMS、OODBMS、Object-Relational DBMS、Client/Server 的架構及相關理論與應用以及它們與Relational DBMS的異同，並討論DBMS在現代社會的角色及重要性。另外，其他重要主題包括：Transaction Management, Concurrency Control, Query Processing, XML 與 Data Warehousing等。
schedule:
第一週   Introduction
第二週   Transaction Management and Concurrency Control I
第三週   Transaction Management and Concurrency Control II
第四週   Transaction Management and Concurrency Control III
第五週   Transaction Management and Concurrency Control IV
第六週   Transaction Management and Concurrency Control V
第七週   Data warehousing and OLAP Analysis I
第八週   Data warehousing and OLAP Analysis II
第九週   期中考 (Mid-term Exam)
第十週   Object-Oriented Databases
第十一週 Object-Relational Databases
第十二週 Distributed Databases
第十三週XML and its applications
第十四週 Recovery System
第十五週 Query Optimization
第十六週 Advanced Data Types and New Applications I
第十七週 Advanced Data Types and New Applications II
第十八週 期末考試 (Final Exam)
scorePolicy:
1. 課堂參與  10%
2. 課堂中的隨堂測驗 (Quiz) 10%
3. 作業繳交  20%
4. 期中考試　30%
5. 期末考試  30%
materials:
1. "Databases and Transaction Processing - An Application-Oriented Approach", Author: Philip M. Lewis, Arthur Bernstein, Michael Kifer, 2002, Publisher: Addison-Wesley.
2. "Database System Concepts", 5th edition, Avi Silberschatz, Henry  F. Korth and S. Sudarshan, 2005, Publisher: McGraw Hill.
3. "Database Processing: Fundamentals, Design and Implementation", 9th Edition, David M. Kroenke, 2003, Publisher: Prentice Hall.
4. "Fundamentals of Database Systems", 4th Edition, Ramez A. Elmasri, Shamkant B. Navathe, 2004, Publisher: Addison-Wesley.
5. "Database Systems: A Practical Approach to Design, Implementation, and Management", 4th Edition, Thomas Connolly and Carolyn Begg, 2004, Publisher: Addison-Wesley.
